pages.title: Housing
pages.text: Housing blocks are the building blocks of the Turbine.$(br2)They are required to build its frame, support its $(l:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l) and are also used to craft the other parts. Housing blocks can also be used to fill the faces of the Turbine if you don't like glass too much.$(br2)You will craft a lot of them.
$(l)Mandatory:$() they are required to build the frame and the $(l:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l)$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
